title: Metallica en Caracas 2010
description:
Este es el concierto de Metallica del 12/3/2010 en el estadio de beisbol de La Rinconada en Caracas, grabado por la misma banda.

Setlist:

        Creeping Death
        For Whom the Bell Tolls
        Fuel
        Harvester of Sorrow
        Fade to Black
        That Was Just Your Life
        The End of the Line
        The Day that Never Comes
        Sad but True
        Cyanide
        One
        Master of Puppets
        Blackened
        Nothing Else Matters
        Enter Sandman

        Encore:
        Last Caress (Misfits cover)
        Whiplash
        Seek & Destroy
